title: Cash Is King At The REA Auction
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Cash Is King At The REA Auction
posts.post_content:
Posted By: bruce dorskind



The REA Auction's mouth watering offering of rare cards
should set many new records.

Here's your opportunity to have more "cash" on hand to
compete.

Our recent advertisements have brought us 10 different
cards from America's Toughest Want List...

However, we're still looking for the ultra rare type cards.
Prefer non-Hall of Famers for our type collection


N 162 PSA 7 or better
E 93 PSA 7 or better
E 96 PSA 7 or better
E 98 PSA 7 or better
E 99 PSA 5 or better

Texas Tommy PSA 5 or better
Oxford Confection PSA 5 or better

T 208 PSA 4 or better
T216 PSA 5 or better
T 217 PSA 5 or better


Please write in strict confidence to

bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com

Bruce Dorskind
America's Toughest Want List
